Text.Page: A message sends you to the Island of Dawn to inquire about the Mysterium's research of noctenium.

[Federation Order]

Mysterium researchers have been dispatched to the Island of Dawn to research a new substance they call noctenium. This substance must be the federation's salvation.

Compile a report on noctenium and their research. Start with Adria on the Island of Dawn.

I can't be much help. With the federation infrastructure crumbling, it takes all my efforts to keep things functioning here on the island.

Don't worry, though. {@linkcreature:213#1150#Todoro} will tell you all about noctenium and show you around their little secret research spot.
